title: Typing Contest Event CPI IT CLUB
description: The CPI IT Club-sponsored ICT Cup is not your typical futsal competition. It's a special occasion that motivates IT pros to take a break from their typical tech routine and get moving while mingling with others in a laid-back and enjoyable environment.

title: Web Development Workshop
description: Join us for an intensive web development workshop where you'll learn the latest technologies like React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Perfect for beginners and intermediate developers.

title: App Development Hackathon
description: Participate in our 24-hour hackathon focused on building innovative mobile apps. Collaborate with like-minded developers and win exciting prizes!
